The signed area of the parallelogram generated by $\begin{pmatrix} 2 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}$ and $\begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ 0 \end{pmatrix}$ is
\[\begin{vmatrix} 2 & 3 \\ 1 & 0 \end{vmatrix} = (2)(0) - (3)(1) = -3,\]and the signed area of the parallelogram generated by $\begin{pmatrix} 5 \\ 4 \end{pmatrix}$ and $\begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix}$ is
\[\begin{vmatrix} 5 & 1 \\ 4 & 2 \end{vmatrix} = (5)(2) - (1)(4) = 6.\]Therefore, $\det \mathbf{M} = \frac{6}{-3} = \boxed{-2}.$
